name: +TheChosen+
description:
I'm trying to create a  shooter  3D.

try the game that I am still finishing developing and let me know what you think, what can I improve etc etc

for now there are only 4 maps implemented but I think to add others, thanks to your advice and suggestions

comment and tell me what you don't like

the game will remain free even when I release it definitively, however if you like what I do and you want to give me money to get me a coffee, go ahead.

In the next update,  i'll add story to the game, and a new level
